text: Iamɨgali 17.5 2 Te 2.7-11, CHL 14.8, 16.19, 18.2, 18.9-10, 19.1-2 agadɨ lɨbam hɨvɨ hɨve lama ibi nameŋ lɨbavalɨ uami. Babilon haiabɨla hekɨlɨ agaŋ akuaba akuaba lusɨŋ sɨbɨlɨ sɨbɨlɨ fɨli hɨsɨŋ agɨladɨ hali hɨsɨŋ me hɨni aba abavalɨ uami. Nɨbu hɨbɨ pɨlɨ hɨsɨŋ iamɨgali agɨladɨ hali hɨsɨŋ me hɨni aba abavalɨ uami.
